welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hedehusene, a charming Danish town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and experience the warm hospitality of our community. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roskilde Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Roskilde Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Kastrup Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights at Kastrup Airport.

wifi.note: The airport provides free WiFi for passengers, but it may have limited coverage in certain areas.
